class.name: ontology.classes.concretes.PlannedWork
class.description: Represents the idea of a human construction to come. Contains all the specifics required for construction.

method.name: isCreated
method.description: Returns true if this element is entierly built.

method.name: reachIt
method.description: For the agent to enact the decision to move towards this object, along some path. Returns true once the agent has reached the end-point of the path (please note that this end-point may be distinct from the target position to reach).

argument.name: pathType
argument.description: The path type used by agent Unit to reach the given destination.
